bibl.title: Did Herodotus ever go to Egypt?
bibl.note: Expanded version of a paper given before the American Research Center in Egypt at Johns Hopkins University, November 14, 1975. - Introduction. - H. and the blacks of Egypt. - H. and the priests. Graeco-Egyptian Syncretism in the fifth cent. Chemmis. - Conclusions.
bibl.seg: Armayor O. Kimball, Did Herodotus ever go to Egypt?

Expanded version of a paper given before the American Research Center in Egypt at Johns Hopkins University, November 14, 1975. - Introduction. - H. and the blacks of Egypt. - H. and the priests. Graeco-Egyptian Syncretism in the fifth cent. Chemmis. - Conclusions.
